docs.lead_paragraph: INTERNATIONAL A3-12 Israeli Cabinet Approves Idea of More Land to Arabs The Israeli Cabinet approved in principle the ceding of more land to the Palestinians, though it left open how much to transfer and when. The Cabinet also insisted that before withdrawal was discussed, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu must offer his plan for a final settlement with the Palestinians, specifying which land he intended to retain. A1 Judicial Test in Canada A judge in Canada is scheduled today to decide the fate of a man convicted of killing his 12-year-old daughter, who was afflicted with advanced cerebral palsy. The case has opened a wide rift in Canada over so-called mercy killing and the rights of the handicapped. A3
